Package org.sonatype.restsimple.spi

Interface Summary
NegotiationTokenGenerator Server side component for implementing a version or content negotiation challenge between a client and a server.
ResourceModuleConfig<T> Bind and install a resource using dependency injection (Default is Guice).
ServiceDefinitionGenerator Generates a resource based on the information a ServiceDefinition represents.
ServiceDefinitionModule A simple interface allowing applications to define a list of ServiceDefinition to deploy, and configure the server side functionality.
ServiceDefinitionProvider A Marker Interface used as a Guice Provider for ServiceDefinition
 

Class Summary
RFC2295NegotiationTokenGenerator Generate an Alternates headers based on RFC 2295.
ServiceHandlerMapper A URI mapper for ServiceHandler.
